title: So you think you know your taxes: Take our quiz to find out
text:
How well do you know your taxes? Take our quiz The IRS expects more than 155 million returns to be filed this year. The average refund issued last year was $2,895. More than 70 percent of taxpayers are expected to get refunds this year, the IRS found. Published 8 Hours Ago CNBC.com 
Sure, your accountant has spent plenty of time steeped in income tax returns, but do you know enough about your Form 1040 to ace CNBC's tax quiz? 
The IRS predicts it will receive more than 155 million tax returns this year. See where you stand on this 10 question test. 
The quiz was compiled with the cooperation of certified public accountants Jeffrey Levine, CEO of BluePrint Wealth Alliance in Garden City, New York, and Debbie Freeman, director of financial planning at Peak Financial Advisors in Denver. 
This story is part of CNBC's Tax Week coverage as the filing season wraps up on April 17. Stay tuned for more stories on tax tips and savings opportunities.
